name: Settling Ash
description:
It was the end of the school holidays... 

Ash had just moved to a new town... 

Can you help Ash settle into the first week of their new life? 

Choose your avatar for Ash and Help guide them through the first week of their new life. Try to keep Ash happy by making friends, doing well at school, helping out family and finding fun things to do! 

Explore Ash's new town and complete various mini games to help boost Ash's mood. 

Following the success of Rubber Man made by her little brother Jacob, Emily (aged 10) decided to create her own game using unity's 3D game kit.
